abstract: Americans have more devices sucking down data. And the carriers couldn't be happier about that. Revenue from data services rose 21.2 percent from a year earlier.
snippet: Americans have more devices sucking down data. And the carriers couldn't be happier about that. Revenue from data services rose 21.2 percent from a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO -- Watching all those people juggling phones and tablets and e-readers in stores, subways and coffee shops, not to mention the many small shops continually offering new models of phones, you could think that there are more wireless devices than people.
